verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
Avenge<WH5358> <WH5360> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> of the Midianites:<WH4084> afterward<WH310> shall you be gathered<WH622> to your people.<WH5971>

And Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> to the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> Arm<WH2502> some<WH582> of yourselves<WH853> to the war,<WH6635> and let them go<WH1961> against<WH5921> the Midianites,<WH4080> and avenge<WH5414> <WH5360> the LORD<WH3068> of Midian.<WH4080>
Of every tribe<WH4294> a thousand,<WH505> throughout all<WH3605> the tribes<WH4294> of Israel,<WH3478> shall you send<WH7971> to the war.<WH6635>
So there were delivered<WH4560> out of the thousands<WH505> of Israel,<WH3478> a thousand<WH505> of every tribe,<WH4294> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> thousand<WH505> armed<WH2502> for war.<WH6635>

And Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> them to the war,<WH6635> a thousand<WH505> of every tribe,<WH4294> them and Phinehas<WH6372> the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> to the war,<WH6635> with the holy<WH6944> instruments,<WH3627> and the trumpets<WH2689> to blow<WH8643> in his hand.<WH3027>
And they warred<WH6633> against<WH5921> the Midianites,<WH4080> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses;<WH4872> and they slew<WH2026> all<WH3605> the males.<WH2145>

And they slew<WH2026> the kings<WH4428> of Midian,<WH4080> beside<WH5921> the rest of them that were slain;<WH2491> namely, Evi,<WH189> and Rekem,<WH7552> and Zur,<WH6698> and Hur,<WH2354> and Reba,<WH7254> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> of Midian:<WH4080> Balaam<WH1109> also the son<WH1121> of Beor<WH1160> they slew<WH2026> with the sword.<WH2719>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> took all the women<WH802> of Midian<WH4080> captives,<WH7617> and their little<WH2945> ones, and took the spoil<WH962> of all their cattle,<WH929> and all<WH3605> their flocks,<WH4735> and all<WH3605> their goods.<WH2428>
And they burnt<WH8313> all<WH3605> their cities<WH5892> wherein they dwelled,<WH4186> and all<WH3605> their goodly castles,<WH2918> with fire.<WH784>
And they took<WH3947> all<WH3605> the spoil,<WH7998> and all<WH3605> the prey,<WH4455> both of men<WH120> and of beasts.<WH929>

And they brought<WH935> the captives,<WH7628> and the prey,<WH4455> and the spoil,<WH7998> to Moses,<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and to the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to the camp<WH4264> at<WH413> the plains<WH6160> of Moab,<WH4124> which<WH834> are by Jordan<WH3383> near Jericho.<WH3405>

And Moses,<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and all<WH3605> the princes<WH5387> of the congregation,<WH5712> went<WH3318> forth<WH3318> to meet<WH7125> them without<WH2351> the camp.<WH4264>

And Moses<WH4872> was wroth<WH7107> with the officers<WH6485> of the host,<WH2428> with the captains<WH8269> over thousands,<WH505> and captains<WH8269> over hundreds,<WH3967> which came<WH935> from the battle.<WH6635>
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them, Have you saved<WH2421> all<WH3605> the women<WH5347> alive?<WH2421>

Behold,<WH2005> these<WH2007> caused<WH1961> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> through the counsel<WH1697> of Balaam,<WH1109> to commit<WH4560> trespass<WH4604> against the LORD<WH3068> in the matter<WH1697> of Peor,<WH6465> and there was a plague<WH4046> among the congregation<WH5712> of the LORD.<WH3068>

Now<WH6258> therefore kill<WH2026> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> among the little<WH2945> ones, and kill<WH2026> every<WH3605> woman<WH802> that has known<WH3045> man<WH376> <WH2145> by lying<WH4904> with him.
But all<WH3605> the women<WH802> children,<WH2945> that have not known<WH3045> a man<WH376> <WH2145> by lying<WH4904> with him, keep alive<WH2421> for yourselves.

And do you abide<WH2583> without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264> seven<WH7651> days:<WH3117> whoever<WH3605> has killed<WH2026> any person,<WH5315> and whoever<WH3605> has touched<WH5060> any slain,<WH2491> purify<WH2398> both yourselves and your captives<WH7628> on<WH5921> the third<WH7992> day,<WH3117> and on<WH5921> the seventh<WH7637> day.<WH3117>

And purify<WH2398> all<WH3605> your raiment,<WH899> and all<WH3605> that is made<WH3627> of skins,<WH5785> and all<WH3605> work<WH4639> of goats'<WH5795> hair, and all<WH3605> things made of wood.<WH6086>

And Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> said<WH559> to the men<WH582> of war<WH6635> which went<WH935> to the battle,<WH4421> This<WH2063> is the ordinance<WH2708> of the law<WH8451> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses;<WH4872>
Only<WH389> the gold,<WH2091> and the silver,<WH3701> the brass,<WH5178> the iron,<WH1270> the tin,<WH913> and the lead,<WH5777>

Every<WH3605> thing<WH1697> that may abide<WH935> the fire,<WH784> you shall make<WH5674> it go<WH5674> through the fire,<WH784> and it shall be clean:<WH2891> nevertheless<WH389> it shall be purified<WH2398> with the water<WH4325> of separation:<WH5079> and all<WH3605> that stays<WH935> not the fire<WH784> you shall make<WH5674> go<WH5674> through the water.<WH4325>
And you shall wash<WH3526> your clothes<WH899> on<WH5921> the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> and you shall be clean,<WH2891> and afterward<WH310> you shall come<WH935> into the camp.<WH4264>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Take<WH5375> the sum<WH7218> of the prey<WH4455> that was taken,<WH7628> both of man<WH120> and of beast,<WH929> you, and Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and the chief<WH7218> fathers<WH1> of the congregation:<WH5712>

And divide<WH2673> the prey<WH4455> into<WH413> two<WH2673> parts; between<WH996> them that took<WH8610> the war<WH4421> on them, who went<WH3318> out to battle,<WH6635> and between<WH996> all<WH3605> the congregation:<WH5712>

And levy<WH7311> a tribute<WH4371> to the Lord<WH3068> of the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> which went<WH3318> out to battle:<WH6635> one<WH259> soul<WH5315> of five<WH2568> hundred,<WH3967> both of the persons,<WH120> and of the beeves,<WH1241> and of the asses,<WH2543> and of the sheep:<WH6629>
Take<WH3947> it of their half,<WH4276> and give<WH5414> it to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> for an heave<WH8641> offering<WH8641> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And of the children<WH1121> of Israel's<WH3478> half,<WH4276> you shall take<WH3947> one<WH259> portion<WH270> of fifty,<WH2572> of the persons,<WH120> of the beeves,<WH1241> of the asses,<WH2543> and of the flocks,<WH6629> of all<WH3605> manner of beasts,<WH929> and give<WH5414> them to the Levites,<WH3881> which keep<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the LORD.<WH3068>
And Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> did<WH6213> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And the booty,<WH4455> being the rest<WH3499> of the prey<WH957> which<WH834> the men<WH5971> of war<WH6635> had caught,<WH962> was six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and seventy<WH7657> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> sheep,<WH6629>
And three score<WH7657> and twelve<WH8147> thousand<WH505> beeves,<WH1241>
And three score<WH8346> and one<WH259> thousand<WH505> asses,<WH2543>
And thirty<WH7970> and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> persons<WH5315> <WH120> in all,<WH3605> of women<WH802> that had not known<WH3045> man<WH2145> by lying<WH4904> with him.

And the half,<WH4275> which was the portion<WH2506> of them that went<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635> was in number<WH4557> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and seven<WH7651> and thirty<WH7970> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> sheep:<WH6629>
And the LORD's<WH3068> tribute<WH4371> of the sheep<WH6629> was six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> and three score<WH7657> and fifteen.<WH7657>
And the beeves<WH1241> were thirty<WH7970> and six<WH8337> thousand;<WH505> of which the LORD's<WH3068> tribute<WH4371> was three score<WH7657> and twelve.<WH8147>
And the asses<WH2543> were thirty<WH7970> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred;<WH3967> of which the LORD's<WH3068> tribute<WH4371> was three score<WH8346> and one.<WH259>
And the persons<WH5315> <WH120> were sixteen<WH8337> <WH6240> thousand;<WH505> of which the LORD's<WH3068> tribute<WH4371> was thirty<WH7970> and two<WH8147> persons.<WH5315> <WH120>

And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> the tribute,<WH4371> which was the LORD's<WH3068> heave<WH8641> offering,<WH8641> to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And of the children<WH1121> of Israel's<WH3478> half,<WH4276> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> divided<WH2673> from the men<WH582> that warred,<WH6633>

(Now the half<WH4275> that pertained to the congregation<WH5712> was three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and thirty<WH7970> thousand<WH505> and seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> sheep,<WH6629>
And thirty<WH7970> and six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> beeves,<WH1241>
And thirty<WH7970> thousand<WH505> asses<WH2543> and five<WH2568> hundred,<WH3967>
And sixteen<WH8337> <WH6240> thousand<WH505> persons;<WH5315> <WH120>)

Even of the children<WH1121> of Israel's<WH3478> half,<WH4276> Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> one<WH259> portion<WH270> of fifty,<WH2572> both of man<WH120> and of beast,<WH929> and gave<WH5414> them to the Levites,<WH3881> which kept<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the LORD;<WH3068> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> the gold<WH2091> of them, even all<WH3605> worked<WH4639> jewels.<WH3627>

(For the men<WH582> of war<WH6635> had taken spoil,<WH962> every man<WH376> for himself.)
